ygData.subject: Re: Questions and Tips
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes congrats, good info my frined. I have a nice quest for you all gang. Go kill Trumpy IronToe in South Qeynos and Bring his head to an NPC in Kaladim, i
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Congrats to you sir, this is the first time i have ever seen
> any kind of
> useful info on this sight. Hopefully we will all follow your
> lead. If i find
> out any info on your bags Ill be sure to post it.
>

Yes congrats, good info my frined. I have a nice quest for you all gang. Go
kill Trumpy IronToe in South Qeynos and Bring his head to an NPC in Kaladim,
i can`t remember his first name, something BloodForge and he`ll gave you a
BloodForge Hammer. 2H blunt magic +10 resist magic, 13 dam 50 del and light.
A good hammer. Take a note that you need to have a good faction with him if
you want to have the hammer.

The only problem is that if you kill Trumpy this will ruined your faction
with QeynosCorruptGuard =(( I`m now KOS with them.

If someone have an idea where I can raise my faction with them please let me
know.

Thanks

Simbad on Karana
